Articles.Content:
So, my orbits, especially the one in 75 km is getting very crowded.

So, it gets hard to target some of the vessels for rendezvous.

Is there a trick? In Mapview, i hover over the one I want and get always the other one as "target"...

Edited November 3, 2013 by Tokay Gris

Switch to the ship in tracking station and using the rename option change its icon to something unusual, e.g. rover. Do the same with your other ship. Then move the mouse at the center of the top of the game screen in map view and click on the rover icon. Everything else will disappear and you will see your two ships.
